user.title: ČEZ HDO Setup
user.description: Enter your EAN number from ČEZ Distribuce invoice.

data_description.ean: 18-digit EAN number from your electricity invoice

captcha.title: CAPTCHA Verification
captcha.description:
To verify EAN **{ean}**, enter the code from the image below.

![CAPTCHA]({captcha_image})

*If you don't see the image, go back and try again.*

data_description.captcha: Type the characters shown in the image above

signal.title: Select HDO Signal
signal.description:
{signal_count} HDO signal(s) found for your location.

**If you don't know your signal**, select the first one. You can also find your signal in your contract with ČEZ Distribuce.

data_description.signal: HDO signal code for your tariff switching times

entity_suffix.title: Entity ID Suffix
entity_suffix.description:
Enter a suffix that will be used in entity names.

**Example with default suffix:**
`sensor.cez_hdo_lowtariffstart_{example_entity}`

**Example with custom suffix** (e.g. `cottage`):
`sensor.cez_hdo_lowtariffstart_cottage`

You can change the suffix to better distinguish multiple devices.

data_description.entity_suffix: Suffix added to all entity IDs (you can enter custom text, e.g. cottage, apartment, house)

prices.title: Tariff Prices Setup
prices.description: Set prices for low (NT) and high (VT) tariff. Prices are used for cost calculations in the card.

data_description.low_tariff_price: Price per kWh in low tariff
data_description.high_tariff_price: Price per kWh in high tariff
